segments.text: I'm not sure , is this our stop ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have any idea where we are ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This can't be the right stop .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think this is right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We got off too early , didn't we ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , we did get off too early .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I should've just stayed on the bus .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great , we have to walk now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You want to wait for the next bus ?
segments.speaker: S2
